Name: Tomate
Instructions: POUR pastis and grenadine into glass. SERVE iced water separately in a small jug (known in France as a 'broc') so the customer can dilute to their own taste (I recommend five shots). Lastly add ice to fill glass.
Review: The traditional aniseed and liquorice French café drink with a sweet hint of fruit.
History: Very popular throughout France. Pronounced 'Toh-Maht', the name literally means 'tomato' and refers to the drink's colour.
Nutrition: One serving of Tomate contains 98 calories
